project.name: ArchLinux Development Stack
project.description:
The ArchLinux Development Stack provides a Stack of Software packages, which can be used for Software Development Projects. This Stack includes some of the best applications in the Open Source arena, like:
Nexus - Maven Repository Sonar - Metric System for Maven projects Hudson - CI-Tool Redmine - Project Management System
These packages are packed for ArchLinux and in a later phase we are going to provide some additional configuration and glue-code to minimize the overhead of all these components on one hardware.

license.name: gpl
